strike.narrative: Two brothers�Ahmed and Mohammed�were walking down the road. A missile whistled in. They never made 15.
Abdul saw it all. "The drone chased them." As the taxi drove past a farm, four people were swallowed by fire.
More than 20 air strikes--both drone and 'manned'--were launched in Abyan, Al Bayda and Shabwah.
Two men were riding a motorcycle. A drone missile came out of the sky.
Carnage is the word. U.S. drones and commandos killed 30 people, including Dr. Awlaki's 8-year old granddaughter.
While the world was marching, Donald Trump's first drone strike killed 3 people in a car.
A Sunday drone strike, the last of the Obama years, killed one person "in a remote area."
Jalal was driving through al-Baydah when a missile ended his life. 2 people killed.
Nine new strikes. 28 people.
Missiles struck a car in Rada'a, killing 5 people.
Three drone strikes. In a military press release, the United States announced the end of 13 people.
Three drone strikes. In a military press release, the United States announced the end of 13 people.
Three drone strikes. In a military press release, the United States announced the end of 13 people.
3 people killed.
On Saturday, 3 people were killed in a car.
A U.S. drone fired missiles at a car, wounding 4 people.
Fireworks. Or something like it. A missile from the sky. Three people were burned in their car.
While the U.S. announced its drone strike statistics, three people were killed in an SUV.
On Monday, a drone missile hit a home, ending the lives of 5 people.
Three U.S. drone strikes killed six people across Bayda, Marib, and Shabwah.
On Friday, in south-central Somalia, the United States fired a missile at Mr. Da'ud.
Maybe it was Mr. Mansour. Several US drones lit up a car near Ahmad Wal, killing 2 people.
On Thursday, in the middle of the desert, two drone missiles destroyed a car. 2 people killed.
Two people wounded. Five people killed.
Five people were driving in a Toyota Hilux when a drone strike set their truck ablaze.
Six people, including Abu Sameh, were killed when a US drone missile hit a moving car.
On Monday, and then again on Tuesday, they flew. "We think about 12 militants were killed."
In the early evening, about 20 miles from Jilib, Hassan and 2 others were killed in a car.
Eight men gathered in a courtyard. Above them, a U.S. drone. Two missiles came out of the sky.
On Saturday, a U.S. drone strike killed 150 people.
Paper is all that remained. Dollars, leaflets. And a car--charred. Four people were killed.
This morning, four missiles hit mud homes, killing 4 people and injuring three.
On Monday, a U.S. drone strike killed 3 people, 'badly damaging the office of public water.'
Six more people died when a U.S. drone strike hit their car in Shabwa.
Jalal was driving through coastal Abyan. A drone incinerated him from above. 2-3 others killed.
On the outskirts of Sayoun, a U.S. drone strike 'blew apart' a car, killing 2 people.
3 people were killed in a car.
A U.S. drone fired missiles at a house, killing 5 people.
Four men were driving when a U.S. drone strike hit their car. 'Four charred bodies inside.'
In Shanta Ameerika, or the Five Americas, a U.S. drone strike killed multiple people.
Explosions shook Balad Amin. Five people were killed.
On the outskirts of Marib, a U.S. drone strike killed 2 people in a car.
On Saturday, two U.S. drone missiles hit a car in al-Jawf. 'The four men were not immediately identified.'
A U.S. drone strike killed four people in a car.
Two missiles struck a house, killing 6 people. Four others were wounded.
Five people gathered for a meeting. They were inside a house. A drone strike ended their conversation.
Four people were killed in Mukalla.
Three people were driving through the desert region of Harib. A drone strike ended their lives.
At dawn, as they drove along the coast, 5 people were killed. 'Bombs hit the men in their car.'
A U.S. drone fired missiles at a house, killing 4 people.
Overnight, a US drone attacked a car in Abyan, killing 4 people.
A U.S. drone strike killed 30 people.
Abdul and Shuaib were driving with two others when a drone missile struck their car.
On Thursday, in the town of Rafadh, a US drone strike killed 5 people.
On Wednesday night, a US drone strike killed 4 people in a car.
Near the port of Mukalla, a US drone fired 4 missiles at 3 people, 'killing them on the spot.'
Nine people were killed in a house.
Several drones were flying. Four people were killed. Two missiles destroyed the car completely.
In the deep, forested ravines of Shawal, a US drone strike killed 5 people.
The cease-fire ended. "Meanwhile, a suspected US drone strike hit a car carrying a group of people"
Late on Saturday, a US drone fired missiles at a pair of houses, killing 5 people.
Four people were killed at the palace entrance when a drone missile hit their car.
In Ataq, near the al Farouq mosque, a US drone strike killed 1-4 people.
As they sat down for a meal on the waterfront of Mukalla, a U.S. drone strike killed 5 people.
Ibrahim spent five years at Guantanamo. On Sunday, he was killed by an American drone.
Two missiles slammed into a house, killing 4 people.
Hussein saw it happen at sunset. Three men killed. Drone missiles left them 'completely burnt.'
At dawn, in an area called Markha, a U.S. drone strike killed 2 people in a car.
On Saturday, in the southern province of Shabwa, a U.S. drone strike killed 4 people.
Overnight, while the former president hid in a food truck, a U.S. drone strike killed 3 people.
Four people were killed. 'The bodies inside the car were left charred.'
Yusef died near Dinsoor. 'Unclear how many others may have been killed.'
On Saturday afternoon, in the desert town of al-Saeed, a U.S. drone strike killed 3 men in a car.
Seven people killed in a house. Drones kept hovering, 'creating panic among the residents.'
Three people killed in a car.
Seven people killed, four injured. "The number of dead may go up."
A second U.S. drone strike killed 5 people in Tehsil Ladha.
Unmournable. A U.S. drone fired missiles at a house, killing 7 people and injuring 5.
Six people were killed when two U.S. drone missiles hit a building in Datta Khel.
Abdishakur--or did he go by Tahliil?--died when a U.S. drone fired several missiles at a convoy.
Two U.S. drone strikes killed 9 people in Shawal.
A U.S. drone fired two missiles at the town of Datta Khel, killing 5 people.
Missiles hit a house, killing four people.
Eight people killed, two injured. "There may be more dead bodies under the rubble."
Six people were killed when a U.S. drone fired missiles at a house.
Seven people were killed while gathered under a group of trees.
A U.S. drone fired missiles at a house, killing 4-7 people.
Two men were riding a motorcycle. A drone fired missiles at them. Their bodies are 'charred.'
Overnight, five people were killed, their bodies 'obliterated beyond recognition.'
At least 10 people were killed when U.S. drones struck the town of Radda.
A U.S. drone fired missiles at a house, killing 5 people.
Three people killed. 'The drone was still circling the area.'
Four people were killed when U.S. drone missiles struck a Toyota Hilux.
2 people killed in a car.
Multiple missiles killed four people in Khyber.
Two more missiles. Three people killed. Sixth CIA drone strike since Sunday.
Two people were killed in the 5th U.S. drone strike of the week.
Hours later, four people were killed when a missile struck the village of Kundser.
Third attack in three days killed 6 people.
Eight people killed, six wounded. "Habib's death could not be independently verified."
Five people were killed and 3 others were wounded when missiles struck Shawal Valley.
Four people suspected of being militants were killed by an American drone.
On Friday night, Arafat's kids were hit with drone shrapnel. Three people were killed.
10 people killed.
Four people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a pickup truck.
Ahmed was in the forest. Four drone missiles came out of the sky. Up to 8 people killed.
Three men were driving along a desert road when a drone fired missiles at them, killing all three.
3 people were killed and two women were wounded when a US drone attacked a house in Marib.
Two missiles hit a house. 'The bodies of the five people killed were charred beyond recognition.'
Six missiles extinguished 15 people as they slept in tents and mud houses.
Fifteen people were killed when a US drone attacked a house in Datta Khel.
A US drone fired missiles at a house, killing 6 people.
Ten years after the first CIA drone strike in Pakistan, missiles hit a house, killing 6 people.
Five people driving. A buzzing above. A missile arrived, ending the lives of 'all 5 passengers.'
Missiles split the night in Dande Darpa Khel, killing 10 people and injuring four.
A US drone fired missiles at a truck, killing 6 people and damaging two nearby houses.
On Wednesday night, a US drone strike killed 3 men in a Suzuki.
6 people killed.
Late on Sunday, another strike flipped a car in Shabwa, killing 5 people.
After dawn prayers, three drone strikes shook Mahfad, killing 25 people.
15 people--including 3 of Salem's friends--were killed by a US drone.
Missiles struck 'two huts' in Mahfad, killing 3 people. 'Drones are still hovering over the area.'
2 people--Moajab bin Aziz and Ali Hasan Hadhban--were killed in Jebel Jame.
On Monday night, a US drone fired 3 missiles at a car, killing 2 people.
3 people were killed while driving through al Jawf. It was the fourth reported drone strike of the week.
In the province of Shabwa, a US drone fired missiles at a car, killing 2 people.
The second drone strike of the day killed 1 person in Abyan.
Jaber was sleeping near his car when the missile arrived. 3 people killed.
On Sunday, a US drone fired missiles at a car, killing 2 people.
Driving along a road in Wadi Abeeda, 3-5 people were killed from above.
While walking home, a Yemeni farmer was killed by shrapnel from a US drone.
A US drone fired at least one missile, killing 2 people and 'completely destroying' their car.
On Monday, a drone missile 'missed,' injuring 2 people nearby.
A US drone strike killed 2 men in a pickup truck.
At least 4 people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a building.
Floating on the river between Gerdi and Khyber, a boat was hit with drone missiles. 7 people died, 2 injured.
Third drone strike of the week hit a car in Al Qatn, killing 2 people.
Fifteen people were on their way to a wedding when a US drone 'missed its target,' killing 12.
A US drone strike killed 3 people in a car. 'The suspects' identification wasn't possible.'
Doctors at the Miranshah hospital received two wounded men. Missiles hit a house, killing 3.
Just before sunrise, a drone fired missiles at a seminary, killing 2 teachers and 3 students.
A US drone strike killed 3 men in a car.
Four missiles came for Hakimullah, ending the lives of up to 25 people.
A US drone fired missiles at a house, killing at least 3 people.
Hassan heard a crash. Saw a drone 'disappearing far into the sky.' 2 people killed in a car.
The second strike in two days killed 4 people in Datta Khel. 'Several others' were injured.
On Sunday morning, a US drone strike killed 3-6 people in North Waziristan.
Four missiles struck a pair of houses in Shawal. Up to 7 people were killed.
A US drone fired missiles at a house, killing 6 people. Official: 'death toll may rise.'
At least 4 people died by drone. Official: 'We do not know the identity of those killed.'
Hours after Qaid's marriage, two US drones launched missiles at his car, killing up to 6 people.
A possible US drone strike 'obliterated' a car, killing 2 people inside. Unclear who they were.
At least 2 people were killed by a US drone while driving on a mountain road.
For the third time in one day, a US drone fired missiles at a car. 3 people were killed.
The second drone strike of the day killed 2-3 people in a Toyota.
6 people were killed at dawn. 'The drones circled the air for a while after the attack.'
Up to 7 people were killed when US drone missiles destroyed a pair of cars.
Two US drone strikes killed 4 men in Marib.
In the fourth drone strike since Saturday, 3-4 people were killed in a car.
Early on Tuesday, in the town of Saeed, a US drone blew 3 people and a car 'to pieces.'
8 people were having dinner when a US drone fired missiles at them.
A US drone killed 6 people in Abyan.
On Saturday night, an American drone fired missiles at a motorcycle. 2 people were killed.
At least 17 people were killed when US drones fired four missiles at a house.
On Sunday, a US drone fired missiles at a car, killing Hassan, his brother, and 'three others.'
A US drone strike killed 7 people in Shawal.
On Saturday, two US drone strikes killed 7 people in their cars.
A US drone fired missiles at a mud-built house in Chashma, killing 7 people.
The second drone strike in three days killed 2 men in a car.
On Friday night, a US drone fired missiles at a truck in Al-Mahfad, killing 4-7 people.
Missiles hit a house at dawn, killing 2 people. A woman and child were among the injured.
In the farming town of Wessab, a drone hovered. 5 people were killed in a car.
Drone missiles destroyed a house in Wana, killing 4-6 people and injuring 7 others.
Six drones had been hovering. At sunset, one fired missiles at a house, killing 4-6 people.
Up to 4 people were killed at a market in Datta Khel.
A drone fired missiles at men riding on horseback, killing them and their horses instantly.
6-9 people were killed when a US drone 'pounded' two mud-built houses in South Waziristan.
At noon, between two and six missiles landed on a house and killed up to 5 people.
A second possible drone attack missed its target and left 2 children dead in their home.
Up to 7 people died when a drone destroyed a Toyota. Bodies were burned 'beyond recognition.'
An evening strike targeted a vehicle in al-Jawf, killing 3-5 people.
Up to 4 men were driving on the Sanaa-Marib highway when a US drone fired missiles at them.
3 people killed in a car. 'Their identities are not yet known.'
Up to 6 people were killed in Wadi Abida. It was the last strike of the night.
Later in the evening, 4 people were killed when a drone fired missiles in Marib.
The first drone strike missed its target; missiles landed in a nearby orchard.
Six drones were in the sky. Missiles hit a house. More missiles hit a motorcycle. 6 killed.
Noor's two-room house was leveled by a drone. Residents: 3 of the 11 missiles did not explode.
Yasin's wife and daughter died with him when US drones fired 8 missiles at a house.
Around 2:30am, up to 18 people were killed when US drones fired ten missiles in Babar.
An unmanned aircraft fired missiles at 3 people. Their bodies were 'unrecognisable.'
A drone killed 3-6 in a car, firing '2 more missiles as people tried to rescue the occupants.'
Maulvi was killed on his way from Bermal to Wana. 'Five other people were also killed.'
Sometime in January, a US drone targeted Adel. It missed. 'Another drone killed him immediately.'
3 people were killed when a drone fired missiles at a vehicle.
US drones fired two missiles at a house, killing 4 people and injuring 2 others.
2 men were killed by a pilotless aircraft while riding on a motorcycle.
Drone missiles hit a soccer field, killing 4 people. Hamzah, 16, 'has not been the same.'
The first of two US drone strikes targeted a vehicle in central Bayda, killing 2 people.
Two drone missiles hit a house, killing 4 people.
On Sunday, a US drone fired missiles at a house, destroying two rooms, a car, and 4 people.
Up to 11 people were killed when a US drone fired several missiles into a house near Mir Ali.
US drone missiles killed a man 'who was praying in an open field outside his home.'
At least 3 people were killed and 4 others injured when a US drone fired missiles at a car.
Less than 24 hours after the 44th President's reelection, a US drone strike killed 2 people.
3 people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a house.
Nabila's grandmother was outside her home picking vegetables when a missile came out of the sky.
4 people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a car.
Drone missiles hit a farmhouse, killing Nader and up to 8 others, some of them local teenagers.
A US drone 'fired four missiles at a madrasa, or seminary,' killing at least 16 people.
Several US drones flew into the area before dawn and fired four missiles,' killing 5 people.
Three US drone strikes killed 5 people. Residents: drones had been flying 'for nearly a week.'
US drones fired four missiles at a car, killing 3 people.
Around 9pm, a US drone fired missiles at a house in Mir Ali, killing 5-8 people.
3 people killed in a car. Official: 'The identity of the militants was immediately unclear.'
2-4 people were killed in Abyan.
A drone did not kill 'Guantánamo prisoner 372,' although 5-7 others died.
On Saturday morning, a US drone killed 4 people in a car.
A US drone killed 5 people in the village of Al-Ain.
14 people, 3 of them children, were packed into a Toyota. 'Chaos. Flames. Corpses.' 12 killed.
US drones fired a barrage of missiles at a vehicle and a house, killing 4-6 people.
8 'heavily armed' men were killed while driving through the isolated desert district of Hawra.
Salem denounced Al Qaeda. No matter. While arguing under palm trees, 5 men were incinerated.
A drone fired three missiles at a car. Two missed. Residents pulled 4 bodies from the wreckage.
In the 3rd attack of the afternoon, US drones fired 5 missiles at 2 cars, killing 3-8 people.
Minutes later, 4 people were killed in Dara.
In a string of three drone strikes, US missiles slammed into a mud building, killing 6.
Badruddin died in a signature strike. CIA drones fired six missiles, killing 5-25 people.
The third drone strike in 24 hours killed 2 people near the wreckage of Sunday's 1st attack.
For the second time in 12 hours, a US drone attacked a village in Shawal, killing 4 people.
As residents celebrated Eid al-Fitr, a US drone fired missiles at a house, killing 6 people.
At least 3 people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a small pickup truck.
2 dead. Residents 'recognized the sound of the drone,' which had been flying overhead for hours.
While driving through Hadhramaut, 5 people were killed. A drone fired missiles at their car.
US drone missiles 'pounded a house and car', killing 5-7 people and injuring 4 others.
As many as 14 people were killed when US drones fired 8 missiles at a house.
17-24 killed. As rescuers retrieved bodies, drones continued to hover, firing more missiles.
Either Yemeni airplanes or US drones killed up to 13 people in Abyan.
Two drone strikes hit two cars; 4 killed. 'Flames so intense' no one could look for more bodies.
8 people were killed when a US drone fired two missiles at a house.
On Tuesday night, a US drone killed 4 people in Shawal.
A US drone destroyed a small pickup truck in the suburbs of Aden, killing 3 people.
Hussein, a Red Cross worker, died in an air strike. Unclear if it was Yemeni plane or US drone.
A missile entered Ali's house. His 4-year-old son and 6-year-old daughter died in his arms.
Drone missiles hit a market, killing 3. 'When they started rescue work, another missile hit.'
A US drone strike hit the town of Azzan. 'Casualty figures were unknown'.
4 men were traveling in a vehicle when multiple missiles destroyed their car.
9 more people were killed when a US drone fired missiles at a house.
US drone strikes killed 27 people. Officials: 'No senior al Qaeda leaders died in the attack.'
Up to 6 drones fired missiles at a house, killing Abu. More than a dozen others died as well.
A US drone fired four missiles at a group of people gathered in mourning, killing up to 10.
Khalil and Rehmanullah were riding on a motorcycle when a US drone fired two missiles at them.
A US drone killed 11-12 people in a house.
Up to 5 killed. 'Vehicle caught fire and the bodies of the people inside were badly burnt.'
Two drone missiles hit a house in Mir Ali, killing up to 10 people.
The second strike of the day hit a car. 5 killed. A 'badly burnt body was not identified.'
A US drone strike killed up to 5 people and wounded 4 others.
Drone missiles struck a bakery in the Miranshah market, killing 3-4 people.
The second drone attack in 24 hours killed 10-12 people in a mosque.
One year before the President gave a major speech, a US drone killed 4 people in a house.
A US drone strike killed 2 people in Bayda.
3 people were killed in a car. @BaFana3, a Sanaa-based lawyer, reported the attack on Twitter.
42 people--including 26 civilians--became rubble. 'The plane was gray. It looked like an eagle.'
The last drone attack of the day killed 6-10 people near Aden.
7 people were killed on a desert road in Hareeb. Drone missiles destroyed three pickup trucks.
In Shabwa, an apparent US drone strike set a vehicle on fire, killing its passengers.
A second US drone attacked the town of Shaqra, killing 2-4 people.
A US drone fired missiles at a house, killing 5-12 people.
Nasser, 19, was tending to his farm when Fahd arrived. The drone tore them both to pieces.
9 people killed in Shawal. 'Pakistan said the drone strike was illegal and counterproductive.'
Missiles from a US drone killed 13-15 people in Abyan.
The third attack in two days hit a vehicle near Zinjibar, killing 3 people.
On Monday, while driving in a car, 4 people were killed near the town of Lawder.
3 people were killed when a missile hit their SUV. 'No details' on their identities.
US drone missiles struck a high school in North Waziristan, killing 6 people.
After hearing an explosion, residents saw two pilotless drones. 3 people were killed in a car.
3 people were killed Monday. Mohammed, who lives nearby, said he sees drones 'almost daily.'
US drones fired missiles at a car in Al-Samdah, setting it ablaze and killing 3-4 people.
Missiles killed 12-17. 'Unclear' if strikes were carried out by Yemeni Air Force or US drones.
Up to five US drone strikes killed 5-7 people in the town of Azzan.
7 people were killed when a drone turned their car into 'a charred skeleton.'
On Wednesday evening, a US drone killed 14 people and wounded 10 others on a desert road.
In Shabwah, a US drone killed 8 people in a car.
US drones and Yemeni warplanes bombed the southern province of Abyan, killing at least 16 people.
On Saturday night, 8 people were driving to Marib. A US drone fired a missile, killing them all.
Up to 38 people were killed in 'multiple airstrikes.'
4 people killed in a Hyundai. 6 civilians wounded; Mohamed died. A 'shower' of shrapnel.
One missile pierced the ceiling. More demolished five nearby shops. 4 people were killed.
US drone missiles killed at least 30 people Thursday. Dozens of others were injured.
Four drone missiles hit a house and pickup truck, killing 7 people.
Hafeez, Shamsullah, Wajahat, and Abdullah were killed. 3 others were 'mutilated beyond recognition.'
A US drone killed 4-5 people in a car.
Five drones struck the town of Jaar, killing 6 people.
Up to 24 people were killed in Jaar and Zinjibar, bringing the weekend death toll to 58.
Salim's two brothers -- a teacher and a cellphone repairman -- were killed with 21-32 others.
Seven miles from the first strike, a US drone killed 6 people in a house.
Samir was in a large pickup truck. Above him, a US drone. Missiles killed up to 12 people.
4 people dead. US official: 'a white Kenyan reported killed in the attack was not the target.'
In the second attack of the day, drone missiles hit a pickup truck, killing 10-15 people.
A US drone killed at least 5 people in a house. Several others were wounded.
Badar, living in a rented house, was killed with 4-7 others. His wife and daughter were injured.
Drone missiles hit a house, killing 10. 'Almost all the men were burnt beyond recognition.'
At least 13 people were killed from above.
Up to 5 people were driving when the missiles struck. Their vehicle was 'engulfed by fire.'
Hours after his wife gave birth in a London hospital, 27-year-old Bilal was killed by a drone.
A US drone killed at least 8 people Thursday.
Missiles destroyed a mudbrick house, killing 4. A mother and son, who were inside, survived.
A US drone attacked the town of Zinjibar, killing one person.
In Razmak, at least 4 people were killed when US drones fired missiles into a building.
Deep in the mountains, 15-22 people were killed by missiles from five US drones.
Nine people were sleeping. At 3:45am, a US drone fired missiles at their house, killing 7.
1-2 people were killed in the town of Afgoye.
Five US drone strikes' killed an unknown number of people in Rumeila.
3 people killed in Darpakhel Sarai.
Tariq, 16, and Waheed, 12, were driving to pick up their aunt. A drone ended their journey.
3 chromite miners--Khastar, Mamrud, and Noorzal--were killed in a car. 4-6 dead, 2 injured.
The second attack of the day killed 4 people in a house.
Maulvi lived. But his 20-year-old brother, Hazrat, and cousin, Meraj, did not. 4-6 killed.
Two missiles struck the village of Bobar, killing between 13 and 22 people.
11 civilians killed and more than 20 wounded. Drones seen hovering for 'the last few days.'
3 people killed. Nine missiles. From the rubble, three bodies: Hazrat, Sher, Amir.
US drones fired eight missiles at a building in Baghar, killing 4 people and wounding 3 others.
Azzedine, 15, was grazing camels. His father and brother, 14, were 'scattered into pieces.'
A third possible drone attack killed up to 17 people on Friday night.
While eating dinner with his teenage cousins, Abdulrahman, a 16-year-old US citizen, was killed by a US drone.
Three men stood near a car, talking. CIA missiles took their lives from above.
In the first of several attacks on the day, a US drone struck a house in Azan.
Hours later, missiles hit a house and car in South Waziristan, killing 6 people.
On Thursday, the first of two drone strikes killed 4-6 people in North Waziristan.
A suspected US drone fired two missiles, killing 4 farmers and 'at least 10 camels.'
Two US citizens--Anwar al-Awlaki and Samir Khan--were killed by US drones.
A suspected US drone killed 3 people in a car.
A US drone fired 2 missiles at a vehicle in Azam Warsak, narrowly missing the people inside.
US drones attacked the port city of Kismayo. Residents reported 'explosions around the city.'
Two US drone missiles hit a house in the village of Khushali Turikhel, killing 6 people.
In the second air strike of the day, 7 people were killed.
In the first of 2 airstrikes, US drones killed 4 people. Their target, Saeed al-Shehri, escaped.
A CIA drone destroyed a car, killing 4-5 people.
10 people died when a US drone struck an abandoned hotel and primary school in Abyan.
One day after Eid, a US drone killed 7 people in North Waziristan.
6 killed in Abyan. Source unable to confirm whether air strike was Yemeni Air Force or US drone.
An hour after locals ended their daily fast,' an unmanned Predator drone killed 4 people.
In the first of two attacks, a US drone hit a house, 'killing 3 men, 2 children and a lady.'
Up to 4 people killed in Shin Warsak, reportedly while 'at the house of a tribal elder.'
As people started their Ramadan fast, missiles struck near a girls' school, killing 4 people.
A US drone killed 21 people. Not known 'if any high-profile militants were among the dead.'
3 people killed in a drone strike on a moving car. Bodies were damaged 'beyond recognition.'
A US drone killed 4-6 people in Azam Warsak. Riaz, a local resident, said all were civilians.
15 people killed and 17 wounded in three air strikes. Officials: US Predator drones responsible.
At least 5 people killed in Karadeef.
Drone missiles destroyed a house in Mir Ali, killing 4. 'The death toll was expected to rise.'
A US strike on a car targeted Fahd al-Qusaa, but he left moments before the missiles.
An airstrike, likely including a drone, killed up to 50 people. CNN reported 30 civilians dead.
In the 4th attack of the day, missiles struck a car, killing 'a local villager.'
Linked attacks on a house and car killed up to 15 people, including 4 civilian rescuers.
Up to 13 people, including 3 students--Hafiz, Waheed, and Fayaz--were killed by a US drone.
On Tuesday morning, a US drone fired 2 missiles at a house in Gurwak, killing 12-25 people.
10 people killed Monday. US drones attacked a house and car in the village of Gorwaik.
4-6 people killed. The guesthouse, located close to a market, 'was completely destroyed.'
Hajji, a local resident, said 20 civilians were killed in a house. Officials: 12 'militants.'
A US drone fired 2 missiles at a vehicle in Shawal, the first of two attacks on the day.
In Somalia's first known lethal drone strike, 1-3 people were killed and 'others' were injured.
Minutes later, a suspected US drone attacked a nearby house, killing 5 people.
5 people killed in a car. As tribesmen rushed to the scene, drones struck again. 2 more killed.
At least 6 Yemeni civilians wounded by a US drone.
5 civilians -- a taxi driver, two students, a pharmacist, and a shopkeeper -- were killed in a car.
No one was killed. Drone missiles hit a car, but its occupants had escaped into an orchard.
10 people killed in a house near Wana.
Nader Shadadi was not home. His mother, and 11-year-old Moti’a Haidara, were killed by a US drone.
An unmanned aircraft killed 1 person in Zinjibar.
After following a pickup truck, four US drones killed 4 people, blowing the vehicle 'to pieces.'
In the forested valley of Shawal, 18-23 people were killed in a house.
Third strike of the day killed 3 people in a vehicle. Up to 5 drones seen flying in the area.
8-10 people were killed in a second attack. Witnesses: '7 civilians' among the dead.
At about 2am, three US drone missiles hit a house in Shalam Raghzai, killing 7 people.
While drinking tea in an apple orchard, Ilyas Kashmiri and 9 other men were slain from above.
7 people killed, including 4 civilians, when US missiles struck the coastal town of Zinjibar.
Missiles killed 7 people in a van. Official: 'I do not know whether there was a high-value target.'
A US drone killed 4 people in a vehicle near Miranshah.
Minutes later, another drone fired two missiles at a vehicle nearby, killing 3 people.
6 people killed when US drones hit a house in Mir Ali.
Friday afternoon, drone hovering. 5 people, 4 missiles. Bodies unrecognizable 'due to burning.'
A US drone attacked a pickup van in Datta Khel, killing 7 people.
4 drones hovered. 5 killed, 4 injured. 'No way to ascertain the identity of the slain people.'
6 civilians -- Samad, Jamshed, Daraz, Iqbal, Noor, Yousaf -- died when a drone fired at 'armed men.'
In the country's first unmanned attack since 2002, a US drone killed 2 people in Shabwah.
Missiles fired. At least 25 people killed, including 5 women and 4 children in a nearby house.
Drones struck a pickup truck and motorcycle near the village of Angor Adda, killing 7 people.
42 people, mostly civilians, sat near a bus depot, talking. A drone ended their conversation.
At least 4 people killed when a US drone hit a car in Datta Khel.
A US drone killed 6 people Monday.
6 people were killed in a house and car Sunday. 'Several drones were still flying in the area.'
4 people were killed in Azam Warsak.
US drones destroyed a white car near Spinwam, killing 4 men on the spot.
Minutes later, 5 rescuers -- Jaffar, Faraz, Musa, Kamal, Noor -- were met with more missiles.
The first drone strike of the day killed 3-4 people in a pickup truck.
Hours later, in a second attack, 5 people were killed. Drones hit a house in Datta Khel.
Fazal Karim's house was destroyed by a US drone. 5 people were killed, 3-7 others were wounded.
Missiles struck a car. Moments later, more missiles struck a house. 5 people were killed.
The following night, a US drone fired 4 missiles at a house near Miranshah, killing 11 people.
At least 7 people were killed. Three missiles, an unmanned aircraft, a house, in Azam Warsak.
A US drone was chasing a vehicle. Just after parking, missiles hit the car. 6 died; 3 injured.
Three people were riding a motorcycle in Khar Kamar. A drone fired 3 missiles, killing 3 men.
In the first of 3 strikes, a US drone destroyed a car after it parked outside a house. 4 people died.
At least 3 people were killed when a US drone fired 3 missiles at a house in Datta Khel.
Four missiles from a US drone killed 3 people in Haiderkhel. Between 2-15 others were injured.
Up to 6 people were killed when a US drone attacked a house and motorcycle in Ghar Laley.
Fourth strike of the day. A US drone hit a moving vehicle, killing 4 people in Mohammed Khel.
Third strike of the day. 5 died in Datta Khel.
Hours later, as people gathered to retrieve the dead, US drones fired more missiles, killing 5.
2 US drones fired missiles at a house and car in Mandi Khel, killing 7 people.
5 people were killed when a US drone struck a vehicle in Ghulam Khan.
A pickup truck carrying the wounded was hit last. 4 killed. 6 others from nearby cars died too.
While retrieving the bodies of those killed in the first attack, 4 more were met with missiles.
In the first of 3 linked strikes, US drones attacked 2 houses, killing up to 6 people.
Hours later, a US drone fired 2 missiles at a vehicle in Machikhel, killing 4 people.
Two pickup trucks were destroyed around 10am, along with 21 people.
In the third strike of the day, houses were destroyed. 32 people died.
Between 8 and 15 people were killed in the second US drone strike of the day.
In the first of 3 strikes, 7 people died and 11 were injured when vehicles were hit in Sandana.
7 people were killed in Khyber when a US drone fired missiles at a vehicle.
4 people died when a US drone fired 2 missiles at a vehicle in Spalga.
4 people were killed in a suspected US drone strike in Khadar Khel.
In the 2nd attack, an unknown number of US drones fired 4 missiles at a house, killing 2 people.
Drone hit a car. 2 died; 1 ran to a nearby shop. Drone then hit the shop, killing 2 shopkeepers.
A US drone fired 2 missiles on Sunday, killing 3-4 people. The vehicle was 'still on fire.'
Sanaullah Jan, a college student, was killed in his car with 3 others. His student ID remained.
On Monday, 6 people died when 4 US drone missiles targeted a car and motorcycle in Khaisur.
On Sunday, at least 5 people were killed in a US drone strike.
3 people were killed by a drone in Naurak. Their vehicle reportedly 'exploded into a fireball.'
At least 20 people were killed by US drones. Among them: Sabir, Riaz, Shaukatullah, Haris, Taj.
US drones attacked a car in Miranshah, killing 4. 'No one dared approach the burning vehicle.'
A US drone killed 6 people in Ghulam Khan.
An hour later, 4 people died when missiles struck a car in Datta Khel.
6 US drones fired missiles at a vehicle in Saidgi, killing 9 people.
Third attack of the day. 4 people died when missiles hit a vehicle in Pai Khel.
In the second attack, missiles struck a house and a vehicle in Khaso Khel, killing 4 people.
An unmanned aircraft fired 2 missiles at a vehicle in Qutab Khel, killing 5 people.
A US drone killed 5 people in Haider Khel.
Zar Gull, a vendor in Datta Khel, used to live somewhere. A drone took his home and 4 cousins.
The 2nd attack took place around 2:45pm, when a drone hit a vehicle in Datta Khel, killing 4 people.
One missile was fired at a house in Mir Ali. 5 people were killed.
Naeem Ullah, a 10-year-old boy, was in his home when 6 missiles hit the house next door.
A second missile strike occurred several hours later, killing 6 people at a house in Aziz Khel.
A US drone killed 4 people Friday when 2 missiles hit a vehicle in Machi Khel.
3 missiles were fired at a house. 5 died. Minutes later, more missiles hit a car. 3 died.
A US drone killed 7 people after attacking an Afghan refugee camp near Mir Ali.
Two US drone missiles hit a house in the village of Charkhel, killing 5 people.
6 people were killed in Miranshah.
A suspected US drone fired 2 missiles at a vehicle, killing 2 people in Mir Ali.
Salim, a tribesman, had his house pounded by 2 US drone missiles; 5 people died in Hurmuz.
After 2 drone missiles hit a house, 6 bodies and 2 injured people were pulled from the rubble.
8 people were killed when 2 missiles hit a mosque in Mir Ali.
Several hours later, after the dead were taken away, the same house was struck by 2 missiles.
Saturday's 1st drone attack, which occurred at 10am in the town of Datta Khel, killed 9 people.
A US drone killed 4 people in Zeba. 'The identities of the dead were not immediately clear.'
2 people were killed in Khush Hali.
At least 2 people were killed on Sunday evening. It was the 3rd US drone attack of the day.
A jeep was attacked near Dand Kali. 5 people were killed.
7 people were killed in Datta Khel when a US drone hit a house and then a vehicle.
4 people were killed when a US drone fired 3 missiles at a vehicle in the village of Datta Khel.
Up to 8 people were killed in the 3rd strike of the day. No further details are known.
6 people were killed and 5 others wounded when a US drone fired 3 missiles in Azam Warsak.
At least 7 people were killed in a US drone attack near Angor Adda.
Missiles were fired at 2 people on motorcycles. 2 more were fired as others rushed toward them.
A US drone attack killed 4 people Sunday when 2 missiles hit a vehicle in Dehgan.
In the evening, US drones carried out a second attack, killing 7 people at a house in Datta Khel.
Several' US drones killed 11 people, among them Yahya, Samin, Niamatullah, Shahzad and Ilyas, all rescuers.
4 people were killed when 2 missiles hit a vehicle in Qutab Khel.
8 people died when missiles fired by a suspected US drone hit a house in Shawal.
At least 6 people were killed when a US drone fired 2 missiles at a house in Newey Adda.
In the 4th attack in 24 hours, a US drone fired 2 missiles, killing 6 people and injuring 5 others.
6 people were killed in the 3rd attack of the day.
A US drone fired 2 missiles at a vehicle in Angoor Ada, killing 4 people.
4 children were reported killed when missiles hit a house. US official: no civilians killed since May.
Two missiles were fired on a vehicle Monday, killing 5 people in the village of Khar Qamar.
A US drone fired 4 missiles on a house, killing 8 people and wounding 12.
In the second strike of the day, 3 people were killed when 4 missiles hit a house during Iftar.
A drone fired 2 missiles on a house in the village of Machus, killing 6 people and injuring 3 others.
In the third attack in Kurram, around 11:35pm, 3 people died when a missile hit a mosque.
Barely two minutes later, another missile struck a residence in Badshah Kot.
4 people were killed when a US drone fired 4 missiles, hitting 2 vehicles near a house.
A second drone attack killed 5 people Monday.
3 children became orphans. Their father, Bismullah. Their mother. Their brothers. All killed.
4 missiles hit 2 cars. 6 died. 4 drones were said to be hovering in the area for about an hour.
26-year-old Sohrab, who was leading evening prayers during Ramadan, was killed with 13 others.
The weekend death count rose to 35. Four people perished in Srarogha.
Later in the day, 2 missiles hit a house in Tabbi Tolkhel, killing 7 people.
4 people died when a US drone hit their vehicle. 5 people in a nearby house were injured.
16 people were killed by US drones when 4 missiles hit a house in Angoor Ada.
A US drone killed 7. Elders in the area said many 'were civilians staying in a village house.'
8 people were killed in a drone strike Tuesday when 2 missiles destroyed a house in Karikot.
A US drone attack killed 6 people Sunday when missiles hit a house in Tabbi Torkhel.
A US drone killed 4 people in a house near Miranshah.
A missile, suspected to have been fired by an unmanned US drone, is reported to have killed 13 people and wounded 7 others.
12 hours later, another 3 missiles struck a house in Datta Khel, killing 11 people.
A US drone fired 2 missiles at a house in the village of Khaddi, killing 3 people.
At least 11 people were killed in a village near Mizai Narai. 3 others were wounded.
4 children--including Fatima, Nisar and Naeem Khan--were killed when a drone hit Mohammad Khel.
Two missiles hit a house in Khyber. Reports of the death toll ranged from 5 to 15 people.
Hours later, another pair of missiles killed 10 more people. Drones were hovering all night.
A swarm of US drones launched 12 missiles Friday, killing up to 14 people in Datta Khel.
2 missiles hit the house of Awal Gul, a local tribesman, killing 10 in the village of Inzarkas.
3 missiles were fired minutes apart at a moving vehicle in Marsi Khel, killing 4 people.
Three missiles fired by a US drone killed 5 people in North Waziristan.
7 people were killed and several others injured when a US drone struck the village of Machi Khel.
Missiles fired from US drones killed 4 in Tolkhel, hitting a car and people rushing in to help.
An unmanned US drone fired two missiles at a vehicle near Anbar Shaga, killing 4 people.
13 people were killed Monday when a US drone struck the village of Boya.
6 people were reported killed and 2 injured in an attack on a former school.
A pilotless US drone fired 2 missiles at a village house. 4 people were killed, 5 wounded.
Missiles fired from a US drone killed at least 6 people Tuesday, wounding 3 others.
A US drone killed 8 people Sunday when it fired two missiles in Lowari Mandi.
Half an hour later, 5 more people died in an attack near Maizar Madakhel.
4 US drone missiles struck a vehicle, killing 3 people and leveling a home near Miranshah.
The blasts knocked Hanif down, leaving a tangled mess of smoking metal where the cars had been.
US drones fired more missiles, killing 8, as residents of nearby Ziarat came to recover bodies.
12 people were killed when 7 missiles hit the village of Mizar Madakhel.
Up to 9 people were killed when a US drone fired 5 missiles into a hotel near Miranshah.
10-year-old Naila was at home reciting the Quran when the strike hit. She died on the spot.
Two missiles hit a house. Three people were killed, five were wounded.
A US drone killed 4 people and wounded 2 others in the village of Tabi Tolkhel.
4 people were killed on Monday when a drone fired 2 missiles at a vehicle in Tappi, North Waziristan.
At least 6 people were killed Sunday when two missiles fired from an American drone struck Mir Ali.
In the 4th strike of the day, US drones struck the village of Toor Narai; death toll is unknown.
9 people were killed in a third strike while traveling to help with rescue work
A second strike targeted a group of people in Miran Shah who reportedly fired on the drones.
Eight US drones clustered for a mass strike, firing 17 missiles and killing more than 10 people.
Three missiles believed to have been fired from American drones killed 15 people late Friday night.
At about 6:30pm, a US drone struck a house in Datta Khel, killing 6 people and injuring 4 others.
Four missiles hit the house of a man in Shaktoi, killing at least 15 people.
At least 4 people were reportedly killed an hour after the previous strike, amounting to 9 back-to-back missiles.
A suspected US drone fired 4 missiles, killing at least 5 people in North Waziristan.
At least 10 people were killed in an American drone strike on Thursday morning.
4-5 people were killed by a US drone in Ismail Khel; Liveleak acquired graphic video.
A US drone destroyed a car killing 4 men standing next to it. Next door was 3-year-old Ayeesha.
Shortly after the first strike, as the rescue efforts were underway, a total of 15 people were killed.
At 3:30pm, 2 missiles from a US drone hit the mountainous village of Sanzalai.
A US drone attack killed 5 people Sunday, including a 9 year old boy named Wajid.
Missiles fired from a US drone slammed into a car, killing 3 people. It was the 2nd strike in 2 days.
A US drone missile struck a house on Thursday, killing 3 people and wounding 2 others.
14-20 people were killed and 12 others injured in strike on house in Saigdai, North Waziristan.
A US drone fired 4 missiles in the Shagga village of North Waziristan Friday, killing 8 people.
An attack with 5 drones destroyed 2 houses and 2 cars, killing up to 16 people.
2 people were killed Thursday morning when 2 drone missiles hit a car parked outside a house.
At least 6 people were killed and 8 others injured in a suspected US drone strike in Ladha.
2 missiles fired from a US drone hit a car near Miranshah, killing at least 3 people.
At least 8 people were killed when a US drone struck the district of Mir Ali.
2 missiles from a suspected US drone aircraft killed 4 people and wounded 6.
A suspected drone strike killed at least 4 people in a predawn attack.
US drone strike killed 27 people in Bajaur.
Sameeda, who appeared to be around 6, was hurt in her right leg, while Fatima, around 4, had head injuries.
At least 4 people were killed by a suspected US drone missile in Dande Darpa Khel.
In the 4th attack since Monday evening, a missile-firing US drone killed 8 people.
In the 2nd attack of the day, US drones hit a house in North Waziristan, killing at least 4 people.
Missiles fired from a US drone aircraft Tuesday killed 5 people in South Waziristan.
At least 12 people were killed and 5 injured in a suspected US drone attack in North Waziristan.
3 people were killed and 2 others injured when a US drone missile struck a car near Mir Ali.
12 people were killed in the 2nd drone attack in 24 hours, including 2 women and 3 children.
2 drones had been continuously flying over the town of Mir Ali since Monday morning. Up to 8 people were killed.
A US missile strike from a drone aircraft Thursday killed at least eight people.
Up to 21 people were killed, including three women and six children.
A US missile struck a house near the town of Kani Gurram, killing at least 10 people.
Baitullah Mehsud and as many as 10 others were killed by a US Predator drone in Zanghara.
A 'drone raid' on a house killed up to 6 people and wounded 4 more.
Another possible drone strike killed 5 people in Tiyarza.
2 US drone missiles killed at least 3 people in the Painda Khel region of South Waziristan.
Up to 40 people died when 5 US drone missiles hit a vehicle convoy in Ladha.
In the first of Wednesday's attacks, missiles hit the thickly-forested Karwan Manza, killing 10 people.
At least 16 people were killed in a US drone strike when 2 missiles hit the village of Jangara.
Another US drone attack killed at least 7 people in Kokat Khel.
A US drone killed up to 5 people in Mantoi.
Up to 80 more people were killed when several US drones targeted a funeral.
A US drone fired 3 missiles, killing at least 2 people and injuring several others.
Another strike reported by local security sources. Impact largely unknown.
2 drone missiles killed 1 person. When rescuers rushed to the scene, 2 more struck, killing 8.
A US drone killed 5 people in South Waziristan on Sunday.
In the first confirmed deliberate CIA attack on rescuers, up to 40 people were killed.
A suspected US drone attack on a village killed 9 people and wounded 4 others Tuesday morning.
Multiple missile strikes, including an attack on an ex-school and a car, killed up to 25 people.
A missile strike by a suspected US drone on Wednesday killed at least 6 people.
2 missiles hit a house in Gangi Khel, killing at least 3 people.
A suspected US pilotless plane killed 4 people in an attack on a vehicle in South Waziristan.
A suspected US drone killed 13 people in Datta Khel, including up to 4 children and 3 women.
A pilotless US drone fired a missile in northwest Pakistan on Wednesday, killing 12 people.
A suspected US drone aircraft fired two missiles into a house in Mir Ali, killing 4 people.
Up to 8 people were killed in an attack on 2 cars as they were about to cross a bridge.
A missile suspected to have been fired by a US drone hit a house in Janikhel, killing 5 people.
Missiles fired by an unmanned US drone killed at least 24 people and injured 30 others.
Two missiles fired Sunday from American remotely piloted aircraft killed at least 8 people.
25 killed, several injured in Central Kurram drone strikes.
Two missiles fired from a US drone killed more than 30 people, including an 8-year old boy.
Second strike of the day killed between 5 and 8 people, including 3 children.
President Obama's first drone strike killed between 7 and 15 people, including 1 child.
In the final strike of Bush's presidency, an attack on an abandoned girls' school killed 3-4 people.
A CIA drone strike killed up to 5 people in South Waziristan.
Between 2 and 4 people were killed and 4 injured in a further strike on an anti-aircraft truck.
Two US drone missiles killed 8 in Karikot and Shin Warsak, causing huge fires in both villages
2 people were killed in a night-time strike that set a house on fire.
A missile, suspected to be from a pilotless US drone, killed 7 people on Thursday.
3 people were killed in a missile attack by a suspected US drone.
A US drone fired a missile at a Professor's house, killing 2 or 3 people.
5 people were killed in an attack on a moving vehicle Wednesday, caused by either an IED or a drone.
A pre-dawn attack on a house in North Waziristan killed between 4 and 6 people.
A US drone strike in Bannu killed 4 people and injured 5 others.
11-13 people were killed when a US drone struck a residential area in Shagai.
Up to 14 people were killed in a US drone strike, including 6 reported civilians.
In the second strike of the day, US drones blew up a truck, killing between 4 and 12 people.
More than 20 people were killed when a drone fired 2 missiles, destroying a house near Mir Ali.
A missile from a US drone killed 20 people on Sunday.
US drones struck a seminary on Thursday, killing 10 people and wounding 3.
A US Predator drone killed 6 people and wounded 5 others in the village of Sam.
Unmanned drones targeted a house on Saturday night, killing 4 people and injuring 2 others.
Two missiles hit a house, killing 9 people.
The second US drone strike of the day killed at least 20 people.
Two women and a child were killed in a 5:30am strike on 2 houses which also injured 5 men.
After tribesmen fired on 3 drones circling their village, a Predator killed up to 8 people.
At least 5 people were killed in a suspected missile attack by a US drone.
An early morning attack on a former school killed between 10 and 15 people.
Missiles fired by US drones killed 23 people, including 8 of the target's grandchildren.
Up to 7 civilians, all women and children, were reported killed in a US drone strike.
5 people were killed when a drone fired 3 missiles at a house near the Afghan border.
No details are known about this strike, though it appears in a leaked US intelligence report.
6 people were killed and 8 others injured in a mysterious missile attack on a residential area.
4 people, including 2 Canadians, were killed when a drone missile hit a house near Wana.
A predator drone missed its target, hitting Sardali Khan's house, wounding a woman and 3 kids.
Two missiles hit a house owned by a local tribesman, killing between 8 and 12 people.
2 pilotless planes fired 4 hellfire missiles at about 10pm, killing between 13 and 25 people.
A strike on a seminary killed al Qaeda's chemical weapons team, plus 2 young boys and their mom.
1 person was killed as unmanned US drones fired three guided missiles at a house.
18 people were killed when 2 missiles hit a house in the village of Damadola.
12-15 people were killed in a strike outside Waziristan that destroyed a house and a mosque.
A 2am attack on a house killed up to 13 people.
5 civilians, including 3 children, were reported dead in a strike that killed 12-14 people.
A US drone fired at least 2 missiles early Wednesday morning at a house near North Waziristan.
A missile fired from an unmanned aerial drone killed 5 and wounded 6 others.
20-50 people, including children, were killed in an attack on a school and several houses.
An attack on a religious school killed four people and injured three.
8 people, many thought to be innocent woodcutters, were killed in a likely drone/helicopter strike.
80-83 civilians, including 69 children, reported killed.
18 civilians, including 6 children, were killed when a US Predator fired on 3 houses.
8 people were reported killed including 2 women and 1 child.
5 people were killed, including 2 children, when drones fired on a house 'for about 8 minutes.'
A failed strike destroyed Abu Hamza Rabia's house and killed 8 people, including 3 young girls.
2 people killed in a Predator strike which reportedly targeted Haitham al-Yemeni's mobile phone.
The first known fatal US drone strike inside Pakistan killed 6-8 people, including 2 children.
In the first known US targeted assassination using a drone, a CIA Predator struck a car, killing 6 people.
